question: 暗記
sourceMnemonic: In the <kanji>dark</kanji> if you try to <kanji>write down</kanji> something it won't work very well. You can't see. So, how can you "write something down" in the dark? You write it down in your mind. This is <vocabulary>memorization</vocabulary>! Recognize this word? The SRS application "Anki" comes from this word, I'm guessing!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
